html:
10.20.18  3:21 am   is there a specific reason you have for this biweekly upload schedule?

     it's the absolute best i can do

10.20.18  2:40 am   Do you use a dictionary or thesaurus when writing lyrics

     not usually

10.20.18  2:21 am   why do i keep coming back here?

     to see more questions, and their answers?

10.20.18  1:41 am   why a poem about rain?

     why not

10.20.18  1:14 am   Are any of your songs autobiographical, and if so, which ones?

     i'm a person

10.20.18  12:33 am   can u explain to me how you change the color of just your bass or smaller parts of the frame (like ur hair in 'and the day goes on')??? i don't know shit about animation, just curious

     with the bass, just chroma key the red, and check the 'invert' box, so it will get rid of everything except that color. then you'll have to put that layer on top of another layer which still has everything in. then change the color of the one with just the bass. for the hair one, actually what's happening there is i've keyed IN the skin, so everything changes color. that was one of the first times i did this but now i do it all the time, it's the same trick i described with the bass except instead of taking the bass color i take my skin color, isolate it, then put it on top and then change the color of everything else. this essentially allows me to do the wild colors and i still look human

10.19.18  11:31 pm   If you could do anything, right here, right now what would you do?

     answer some questions

10.19.18  10:33 pm   My sister says you're a hostage in some person's basement with a load of music equipment and the internet, and your videos are a cry for help. Is this true?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it that's not too far off

10.19.18  10:18 pm   what is your opinion on sand

     bland

10.19.18  9:13 pm   would you go on good mythical morning/

     that depends largely on whether they have invited me

10.19.18  9:12 pm   Do you feel forced to keep making these songs and ever look back and miss when you made jingles for vine?

     actually the current song schedule is an exact result of wishing i could do what i was doing then. except with a longer product. which is something i was wishing while i was working under the 7 sec limit.

      Also you seem to be getting more consistent with your upload schedule. Do you ever feel like you're falling back into the black hole of wanting longer content?

     no, i am currently working at the exact length i always wanted to

      Sorry if this is too much.

10.19.18  9:09 pm   Is there a deeper meaning to the song when I get older,

     than what

      me and my friend have chosen to analyse it in a English assessment as it's our favourite song

     that's meaningful to me

10.19.18  8:39 pm   how are u not drained out of creativity yet

     the entire world is made of creativity. all u gotta do is just make sure you don't accidentally turn the power off

10.19.18  8:33 pm   how do i become as cool as you?

     perhaps you are

10.19.18  8:20 pm   musescore or Sibelius?

     handwriting

10.19.18  8:03 pm   how did you make the construction hat flip onto your head in "hallelujah"?

     use gravity and then reverse the video play direction

10.19.18  7:58 pm   i think my motivation's broken, how do i fix it

     what makes you want to fix it

10.19.18  7:51 pm   how did you get over being too small for the mall?

     i thought that story was about you

10.19.18  7:48 pm   how do I draw a crotchet rest?

     it helps to get an electric shock while drawing it

10.19.18  7:47 pm   are the time stamps on this page real or do you just never sleep?

     they are real, and they are the time the question was asked, so they have nothing to do with my sleeping. approximately 40% of the questions are probably asked while i'm asleep

10.19.18  7:23 pm   what is your upload schedule?

     i can't tell you

10.19.18  6:21 pm   honestly at this point you seem in a constant state of existential crisis whats your secret

     curiosity overdose at a young age

10.19.18  6:19 pm   thoughts on materialism?

     seems legit

10.19.18  5:56 pm   10.17.18  10:37
i am more advanced than that, (i know what diminished and augmented chords mean) what i meant to ask is how numbers work within chords for example emaj11,

     that's one in particular you will probably never see. but here's the basic starting examples i can give for that: C7 means C, E, G, Bb.... Cmaj7 means C, E, G, B. ... Cmin7 means C, Eb, G, Bb.... there are some quirks here already with the system, but hopefully those examples expose them.

      whats the diffdrence between that and a sus2, stuff like that.

      Csus4 means C, F, G. and Csus2 means C, D, G... so 'sus' is just a little trick that swaps the 3 out for a 4 or 2. if it doesn't say 4 or 2 then it means 4. so if you see "Csus" on paper that's gonna mean Csus4.

10.19.18  5:18 pm   have you considered getting a camera that is not bad and also some lights for the camera

     yes

10.19.18  4:43 pm   In your newest song you're making an angry face at 1:43. What's that about?... It's great

     that would be to correspond to the sound that happens there

10.19.18  4:39 pm   please make more merch 

     i was thinking of making more videos insteaad

10.19.18  4:29 pm   You said about the moon is made of cheese (but I can't taste it) " there seemed to be a universal response that the chords were just too strange". I found this surprising because when I visit the YouTube comments and the reddit post about the song there seemed to be general enjoyment of the content and crazy key changes as usual and minimal complaint about the chords, hardly a universal response of strangeness. What are the sources of critical feedback you have and choose to listen to?

     ghosts and ghouls i suppose

10.19.18  4:19 pm   Have you ever thought about doing a vlog?.

     i do them

10.19.18  3:01 pm   if you had to give one piece of advise about writing a song, what would it be?

     the only way to know for sure what comes next is if you do a fresh run through, in real time, from the beginning

10.19.18  2:33 pm   ur latest song sounds different from most of ur other songs, at least in my opinion. Why did u decide to do something even more different?

     i try to make every song different, which is sometimes difficult if i am the same person

10.19.18  2:09 pm   how can one ensure the day's/future's plan is realistic while still as ambitious as humanly achievable

     just start doing some plans and then after a few plans you can course correct a bit

10.19.18  1:20 pm   whats wrong with the world today?

     it hasn't gotten as good yet, as it's going to get

10.19.18  12:12 pm   you have this powerful energy to you that i simply can't understand. is this because you've ascended to a higher level of being than us mortals?

     trying to get everyone as high as possible

10.19.18  11:16 am   What is your least favorite video you have made and posted?

     oh nice try, then everyone's gonna go watch it and see how bad it is

10.19.18  9:07 am   What is your favorite quote?

     each one is good at a different time

10.19.18  7:39 am   how would you recommend with dealing with an existential crisis? just the thought of having to die and witnessing everyone i love die is kind of depressing. also kinda the fact that one day the earth will like blow up or something or melt by the sun or run out of resources 

     try to focus on all the amazing things you could do before then. every amazing thing you've ever seen anyone do, was done under these circumstances

10.19.18  7:07 am   do you have lots of fun coming up with ideas for videos

     yes

     or are they spontaneous

     yes

10.19.18  2:40 am   10.17.18  11:48 am why did you have to do fewer clips and takes. Just because of the 14 day schedule?

     yes. to put it in perspective, "la de da" was done in 14 weeks

10.19.18  12:35 am   what if you are a part time content creator but desperately want to release like a lot of stuff but you dont have enough time to make all the stuff

     you'll never have enough time to make all the stuff. there is infinite stuff. so actually, having limited time may accelerate your ability to adapt to this

10.19.18  12:26 am   can you tell us anything about the songs/song fragments/song ideas you have written down in the last week? 

     no but you can hear most of them soon

10.19.18  12:15 am   What do you think of modern music?

     it has a relatively new release date

10.18.18  11:25 pm   are you a fan of puns?

     know whey

10.18.18  11:01 pm   oy, i know that your mind's made up about this one but just know that i'm pretty confident i'm speaking for the majority of people here in saying that i loved cheese. i thought the brevity was the right decision, i thought the chords were entirely in service to the song and made those key changes sound natural, and so on. sure it was clever, but it was also natural and sensible

     oh you are very kind

10.18.18  10:38 pm   How strong do you have to be to lift up the wwhole entire world?

     we'll see

10.18.18  8:50 pm   why are softballs hard

     for strength

     sometimes they plan what the people in the even smaller cubicles are going to do
